heading.name: Preventive Care Bonus: Influenza Immunization
heading.definition: Target population: consists of enrolled patients who are 65 years or older as of December 31st of the fiscal year for which the bonus is being claimed. Service Period: is the current flu season up to January 31st of the year for which the bonus in being claimed. Service Codes reported: G590A, G591A, Q690A, Q691A, and tracking code Q130A
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from CIHIâ€™s 2012 Indicator Technical Specifications (Nov 2012)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.flu > 0, 1, 0) ) ,0 ) AS "% Eligible",
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.flu <= 0, 1, 0) ) ,0 ) AS "% Ineligible"
FROM( SELECT
d.demographic_no AS patient, IFNULL( FLU.id, -1 ) AS flu
FROM demographic d
-- LOOK FOR MOST RECENT FLU IMMUNIZATIONS LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id, p.prevention_date, p.refused FROM preventions p JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id2 FROM preventions WHERE prevention_type = ${prevention} AND demographic_no > 0 AND deleted = 0 AND refused = 0 AND DATE(prevention_date) BETWEEN DATE_SUB( ${upperLimit.date}, INTERVAL ${lowerLimit.date} MONTH ) AND STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( '31,', '12,', ( YEAR( NOW() ) - 1 ) ),'%d,%m,%Y') GROUP BY demographic_no )p2 ON(p2.id2 = p.id) ) FLU -- ensure the patient was 65 at the time. ON (d.demographic_no = FLU.demographic_no AND FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,",",d.month_of_birth,",",d.date_of_birth), '%Y,%m,%d' ), FLU.prevention_date ) / 365.25 ) ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} )
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} -- the patient must have been rostered AND d.roster_status LIKE ${rosterstatus} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} )
)fin

column.name: IFNULL(ROUND( DATEDIFF( DATE_ADD( ${upperLimit.date}, INTERVAL ${graceperiod} MONTH ), DATE(FLU.prevention_date)) / 365.25 * 12, 1 ), 0)
column.title: Grace Period

column.name: CASE WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = -1 THEN 'Not Done' WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 0 AND ( DATE(FLU.prevention_date) BETWEEN DATE_SUB( ${upperLimit.date}, INTERVAL ${lowerLimit.date} MONTH ) AND ${upperLimit.date} ) THEN 'Eligible' WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 0 AND ( DATE(FLU.prevention_date) > ${upperLimit.date} ) THEN 'Done' WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 1 THEN 'Refused' WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 2 THEN 'Ineligible' ELSE 'Overdue' END
column.title: Status

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT -- id d.demographic_no AS 'Id', -- name CONCAT( d.last_name, ", ",d.first_name ) AS 'Name', -- dob DATE_FORMAT( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), '%m-%d-%Y' ) AS 'Birth Date (mm-dd-yyyy)', -- age ROUND( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) AS 'Age', -- date
IFNULL( DATE_FORMAT(FLU.prevention_date, '%m-%d-%Y' ), 0) AS 'Last FLU Date', IFNULL(ROUND( DATEDIFF( ${upperLimit.date}, DATE(FLU.prevention_date)) / 365.25 * 12, 1 ), 0) AS 'Jan 31', IFNULL(ROUND( DATEDIFF( DATE_ADD( ${upperLimit.date}, INTERVAL ${graceperiod} MONTH ), DATE(FLU.prevention_date)) / 365.25 * 12, 1 ), 0) AS 'Grace Period', IFNULL(ROUND( DATEDIFF( NOW(), DATE(FLU.prevention_date)) / 365.25 * 12, 1 ), 0) AS 'Current',
CASE WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = -1 THEN 'Not Done'
WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 0 AND ( DATE(FLU.prevention_date) BETWEEN DATE_SUB( ${upperLimit.date}, INTERVAL ${lowerLimit.date} MONTH ) AND ${upperLimit.date} ) THEN 'Eligible'
WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 0 AND ( DATE(FLU.prevention_date) > ${upperLimit.date} ) THEN 'Done'
WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 1 THEN 'Refused'
WHEN IFNULL(FLU.refused, -1) = 2 THEN 'Ineligible'
ELSE 'Overdue' END AS 'Status',
IFNULL(TRACK.service_code,0) AS 'Tracking Code', IFNULL(BILL.service_code,0) AS 'Service Code'
FROM demographic d
-- LOOK FOR MOST RECENT FLU IMMUNIZATIONS LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id, p.prevention_date, p.refused FROM preventions p JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id2 FROM preventions WHERE prevention_type = ${prevention} AND demographic_no > 0 AND deleted = 0 AND DATE(prevention_date) BETWEEN DATE_SUB( ${upperLimit.date}, INTERVAL ${lowerLimit.date} MONTH ) AND STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( '31,', '12,', ( YEAR( NOW() ) - 1 ) ),'%d,%m,%Y') GROUP BY demographic_no )p2 ON(p2.id2 = p.id) ) FLU -- ensure the patient was 65 at the time. ON (d.demographic_no = FLU.demographic_no AND FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,",",d.month_of_birth,",",d.date_of_birth), '%Y,%m,%d' ), FLU.prevention_date ) / 365.25 ) ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} )
-- TRACKING/EXCLUSION CODE USED. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boc.demographic_no, MAX(boi.service_code) AS service_code, MAX(boi.service_date) AS service_date FROM billing_on_cheader1 boc INNER JOIN billing_on_item boi ON (boi.ch1_id = boc.id) WHERE boi.service_code LIKE ${trackingCode} GROUP BY boc.demographic_no ) TRACK ON (d.demographic_no = TRACK.demographic_no AND DATE(TRACK.service_date) >= DATE(FLU.prevention_date) )
-- SERVICE CODE USED LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boc.demographic_no, MAX(boi.service_code) AS service_code, MAX(boi.service_date) AS service_date FROM billing_on_cheader1 boc INNER JOIN billing_on_item boi ON (boi.ch1_id = boc.id) WHERE boi.service_code IN ${serviceCode} GROUP BY boc.demographic_no ) BILL ON (d.demographic_no = BILL.demographic_no AND DATE(BILL.service_date) >= DATE(FLU.prevention_date) )
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} -- the patient must have been rostered AND d.roster_status LIKE ${rosterstatus} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} )
